title: Curriculum Development Management Strategies and Application of Qualitative Research Methodologies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Curriculum Design Theories and Scientific Research Methodology Understanding
context.additional_context: Practical application of management systems and qualitative research techniques for science curriculum development

learning_goals: One can analyze the curriculum development management process (planning-organizing-implementing-evaluating) and apply it to real-world cases
One can diagnose the status of curriculum development using qualitative research methods (observation, interviews, document analysis)
One can create and present customized science curriculum designs through project-based assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
